variable.name: CVDDEATH
variable.comment: This variable describes the cause of death. Please see DATEDTH for the date of death.

variable.name: CHDDEATH
variable.description: Death due to Coronary Heart Disease (CHD)
variable.comment: This variable describes the cause of death. Please see DATEDTH for the date of death.

variable.name: lastatt
variable.description: Date of last exam attended through 2010
variable.comment: This date corresponds to the date the participant last attended an FHS main clinic exam. This date has been truncated to the end of 2010. Number of days since exam 1.

variable.name: lastcon
variable.description: Date of last contact through 2010 (This is the last time the participant was known to be alive)
variable.comment: This date is censored to 12/31/2010 if the last contact date was after 12/31/2010. This information is missing if subject is dead. Number of days since exam 1.

variable.name: lastsoe
variable.description: Date of the latest record in the 2011 SOE file (vr_soe_2011_m_0691)
variable.comment: This date is censored to 12/31/2010 if the last contact date was after 12/31/2010. Number of days since exam 1.
